body: Aaaaand this is now my top favorite manga. Btw the story is amazing so far ❤ all I gotta say is CMON BRO I WAS CHEERING FOR U BEING WUCH A CHAD, DODGING THE THOT. BUT MY NIGGA ENDED UP FUCKING THE THOT ANYWAYS...? U SOLD. Also I really love how the author puts effort into making the MC's friends have a cool attractive design (The good looking glasses and blonde kid)
Im not into webtoon but this plot omg. The only fault is full censorship.
This... has turned into a difficult situation.
Literally read this for the plot while slowly stroking.
